global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line 2019-06-18T23:14:29 UTC and recovered 2019-07-28T02:39:00 UTC. On 2019-07-23 the glider entered a warm and low-density pocket of surface water that it was unable to punch through. The glider ejected its emergency weight and was put in surface drift mode until recovery.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_379
